news.title: First Middle Eastern X-Ray Factory Readies for Action
news.summary: The Middle East’s first major international research centre has weathered political unrest, international sanctions and even the assassination of two delegates.

news.title: News First Middle Eastern X-ray factory readies for action
news.summary: Adam Hart-Davis/Science Photo Library The SESAME accelerator will circulate electrons at high energies, creating beams of intense radiation that will be used to study cultural treasures.

news.title: SESAME, una luce di sincrotrone per il Medio Oriente - Le Scienze
news.summary: SESAME, il primo impianto del Medio Oriente per la produzione di luce di sincrotrone, sta per entrare in funzione vicno ad Amman, a dispetto dei problemi di instabilità politica della regione e delle difficoltà di finanziamento che questi hanno…

facebook.title: First Middle Eastern X-ray factory readies for action
facebook.summary: The Middle East’s first major international research centre has weathered political unrest, international sanctions and even the assassination of two delegates. Today SESAME officially opens its doors, will it revolutionize science in the region?
